text:
Are there examples on how to build a REST client with tests based on HTTP.jl? I have some interest in having a Salesforce REST client like this, but at the moment I don’t think I want to spend much effort to get it.
<https://github.com/simple-salesforce/simple-salesforce>

elements.text: Are there examples on how to build a REST client with tests based on HTTP.jl? I have some interest in having a Salesforce REST client like this, but at the moment I don’t think I want to spend much effort to get it.

text: If they have API specs, you can use  swagger.jl to generate a rest client

elements.text: If they have API specs, you can use  swagger.jl to generate a rest client

text: The IoT API at least has, but that’s different. <https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_iot.meta/api_iot/intro_swagger_file.htm|https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_iot.meta/api_iot/intro_swagger_file.htm>
